entry.title: harpiats/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
entry.content: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

entry.title: siddharthtiwari-03/UnSQL: UnSQL is an open-source, lightweight JavaScript library that provides schema-less, class based, clean and modern interface to interact with structured Database (MySQL), through dynamic query generation. UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js
entry.content: UnSQL is an open-source, lightweight JavaScript library that provides schema-less, class based, clean and modern interface to interact with structured Database (MySQL), through dynamic query generation. UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: ivocreates/electron-screenshot-app: A lightweight and cross-platform desktop app built with Electron that captures desktop screenshots at custom intervals, supports folder selection, countdown display, dark mode toggle, and export of screenshots as a ZIP archive.
entry.content: A lightweight and cross-platform desktop app built with Electron that captures desktop screenshots at custom intervals, supports folder selection, countdown display, dark mode toggle, and export of screenshots as a ZIP archive.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
